website_summaries.verdict: The one to choose if your place can't accommodate a standard size dryer, as it saves space and does a good job drying small loads.
pros: Compact size makes it ideal for small spaces, and can be wall-mounted to save even more space
Has 5 dry settings, which is impressive considering its size
cons: Lint trap is awkward to change
A few reports of dryers that turned out to be lemons

customer_reviews.title: So far this machine is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant about ordering this dryer because of some of the negative reviews. I got this thing home, plugged it in and went to testing it right away. I put a full load from my 2.1 cubic foot RCA portable washer and was blown away by how well this thing dried. The load included jeans and towels and the thing still dried everything in about 45 minutes. The air did get decently hot, not just warm. Maybe there are some defective units out there or something. I'll update later, sooner if I run into any issues. So far this machine is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: guardeiro

customer_reviews.title: Compact dryer
customer_reviews.text: I’m not the one to write reviews but this little dryer is amazing, it get really hot and I can tested it out by drying 5 big towels at once and they dried with no problem. It also have a lint catcher in the back of it. It’s very quiet and nobody knows it’s even on.. I would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Trece

customer_reviews.title: We love this product
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. However, we have not even had he dryer for a month yet & it is making an awful noise coming from the motor each time the barrel rolls. We want to return/exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: rodsgirl4ever

customer_reviews.title: What a great dryer!
customer_reviews.text: What a great portable dryer! I have a magic chef set! Soo in love with it! They pack it very well! I have a avanti bracket shelf and this dryer fits perfectly on it! Now I have my mini laundry!! THANK YOU AMAZON FOR PROVIDING THE BEST THINGS FOR HUMANS AND ANIMALS!
customer_reviews.author: maddie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little apartment dryer.
customer_reviews.text: Very small but turns out it’s just what I need. I live in an expensive city and have managed to find a great little two bedroom for a great price. However it has no laundry room or laundry facilities. A friend let me use her small portable washing machine and I bought this dryer. It fits perfectly in a utility closet and really works great. I haven’t even had to let it have a full run because everything dries quickly. Very great purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Great first small dryer
customer_reviews.text: We were a little skeptical buying the small dryer but to be honest with you if it's a one or two person family it may be worth it other than that I think you need a bigger dryer. make sure you remove the filter which is in the center of the dryer otherwise it won't dry your clothes well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Cal MTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Very smart purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the purchase of this product. I have a very small apartment space and I am pleased to after washing clothes to be able to dry them. The unit holds a small load and drys within a hour on the hot setting. I am happy with the purchase. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken door hinge. Very poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: Unit came with a broken door. Hinge made from pot metal, and pins were sheared. Extremely disappointed, this was a Christmas Present. Will edit review if replacement is better. Edit. Company replacement door, no charge. Easy to install. 1 year later it's doing fine
customer_reviews.author: Steve Spence

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty awesome. I live in an apartment with no ...
customer_reviews.text: Now that it's working properly, it's pretty awesome. I live in an apartment with no hookups, and the nearest laundromats all charge three dollars a load and hold just as much as this little guy holds. It didn't spin when I first got it. Opening up the back, I found the drive belt had come off the drum. Easy fix. Looking inside, this thing is also very home repair friendly. Which means it's shelf life is nearly infinite. Huge point in it's favor. Only reason I left off a star is for having to open it up and fix it before using it.
customer_reviews.author: H3xx

customer_reviews.title: I Like It,  But.....
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the dryer. Have been using for about a month now with an indoor dryer vent. No problems and the clothes dry quickly. I think not much longer than a regular size gas dryer. Only problem and reason I didn't give 5 stars is the lint filter. It is hard to reach in the back of the dryer and is slightly difficult to remove and to clean. I don't know why this dryer cannot have a easy to remove vent on the top of dryer like most larger dryers. All in all works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: It's had a horrible odor and it just stopped working today
customer_reviews.text: I've had this dryer 5 weeks. I'm assuming it's too late to return it. It's had a horrible odor and it just stopped working today. I checked the outlet and it is fine. Regret not buying a warranty. Do not recommend. This is the first one star I've given on anything I've purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia P

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: A total piece of junk. Drum does not spin at all to tumble dry the clothes. Tried calling magic chef customer service, waited on hold for eternity. Hung up and proceeded to do an Amazon return.
customer_reviews.author: soozx5

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough.
customer_reviews.text: Drys clothes kinda slowly, but it does work. don't overload it or it will take forever. build quality is terrible, no quality control. The bearing for this dryer fell of and that's why some people have complaints of scraping or knocking. I fixed it but should not have had to. I used some metallic tape around the bearing and hammered it back in with a hammer. The clearance was too much and it would fall out easily by default.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey alexander

customer_reviews.title: Good small dryer
customer_reviews.text: we haven't been able to use it that much since we live in California; we would probably use it more in winter and raining days. As mentioned in some other reviews, the buttons on the bottom are a little of a downside, we tested it with a pair of jeans and it took almost an hour to dry, for light clothes this dryer is pretty good, just don't overload it. Removing and cleaning the filter wasn't much of a trouble, what we haven't try yet is to hook it to a window venting kit. Other than that, this is a good little dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Mister Kiu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 5th Wheel
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in our camper. Works great, I could never image running a load for more than an hour. That's about how long it takes to dry a full load of the 2.1 washer. I've under estimated it and my clothes have come out really hot. It works just like a regular full size. Very happy with them both after about a month.
customer_reviews.author: CoupleONuts

customer_reviews.title: The initial product would not heat. Amazon quickly shipped ...
customer_reviews.text: The initial product would not heat. Amazon quickly shipped a replacement. It heated appropriately, but the drum would not rotate. Returned both for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this little dryer
customer_reviews.text: Love this little dryer.....it actually dries several thick towels in less than 40 mins! I've even washed my queen size microfiber blankets and had no problem getting them dry rather quickly! HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS FOR PEOPLE WITH LIMITED SPACE!
customer_reviews.author: Michele R

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this dryer, I finally got it set up. I plugged it in and the drum doesn't spin.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: It made a very loud annoying noise when drying the clothes
customer_reviews.text: The first one I had orginally ordered was defective. It made a very loud annoying noise when drying the clothes. I called amazon and they sent me a replacement one week later. The replacement has work efficiently and gets the job done. I would say it can dry one load in about 60 minutes. Oh and its not noisy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great little dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this almost a year ago and have used it to dry 4-5 loads each week since I purchased it. It works great! I purchased the BetterVent Indoor Dryer Vent, which was a great solution. Since it started getting so warm this year I am venting it out the window to keep it from getting so warm in my apartment. To vent it out the window I cut a hole in a piece of insulation board that I cut to fit in my window so I could close the window and keep the AC in while venting the hot air out! Works perfectly!!! I recommend this dyer without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: DSTARK

customer_reviews.title: Had to reorder, but new unit is great!
customer_reviews.text: My new dryer works perfectly fine, drys efficiently and is easy to maintain, this review would have gotten 5 stars BUT, this is the second model. I had to replace the previous unit after a few days due to some type of component failure that made it stop operating. Even though it was on it's own circuit, level and secure. Maybe it was a 1 out of 10 faulty model, maybe it wasn't, but it did fail. Amazon's prompt service and the new units performance did help my faith in the product though. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Dead After Less Than 8 Months of Occasional Use
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed. I've had this dryer for just under 8 months and used it occasionally. Today, it stopped working completely. I unplugged it, allowed it to cool down, removed the clothing, etc., and then tried again a half hour later. It just makes this clicking noise and will not turn on. Most appliances will work for at least a year, or until the warranty runs out, but not this unit. I liked it otherwise, and was very handy to use. But it appears that the parts weren't made to last, for even a moderate amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Lory

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This little dryer is a little beast it dry fast and good if you are looking for a portable dryer and washer get this one you will not be disappointed this is 10 times better then the haier trust me I had it for 5 years and it didn't do as good as the magic chef. And amazon your amazing keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Dent

customer_reviews.title: I like the size but I'm not happy it overheats every ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the size but I'm not happy it overheats every time I use it and shuts down! I don't want to take it back because I've already got it installed in a fixed area! It works for awhile and overheats and shuts down
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Other than the smell it leaves on your clothes
customer_reviews.text: Dries great, and the price is right, BUT the clothes come out smelling really weird. Basically, your clothes smell like they were dried with a skunk that smokes marijuana. I have run it and run it to get rid of the smell; tired fabreeze, washing the filters, running it with rags soaked in fabric softener, changing my laundry detergent... but nothing worked. So be prepared for dry clothes with mild a pot/skunk smell. ( and no I didn't leave wet clothes in the dryer, so it's not that) ** UPDATE - STILL SMELLS 100 uses later. The company is no help with this. Buy another brand
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Butterworth

customer_reviews.title: Not Drying!
customer_reviews.text: I've finally learned how to dry in this thing. You have to use only the red dot setting at the bottom of the dial. And check the dial once in awhile to put it back on the red dots. To get rid of that weird, skunky, chemical odor, I soaked three dryer sheets in Febreze, ran them on cool, and then after turning the dryer off left the dryer sheets inside the dryer for a day or so. I would not buy this again or recommend it. It's OK for now.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I was really excited when I first get it but ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when I first get it but after use it for about 2 months the dryer starts to make huge noise and I only used it twice a week. I really wants to through it away recently.
customer_reviews.author: Alica

customer_reviews.title: Tried it twice (failed)
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this with high hopes after watching countless YouTube videos and it worked well for less then 1 month. Then it began to leak and the make a very pound roaring. I called MG and they had a technician come out 2 times before concluding that they could not fix the problem. They also sent me a check by mail to buy a replacement which I did however I also purchase an extended warranty and I’m glad I did because once again 1 month later and now the dryer won’t stop running.
customer_reviews.author: ilovetoshop

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer. Ive had It for a few months now. It fits in a normal outlet (3 pronged) and doesnt need hoses or anything. I should have gotten the bigger size as it doesn't hold a lot of clothes but either does my portable washer. All in all its a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan S

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and I wondered why it took two cycles to dry even two pieces of clothing. Then I realized it wasn't spinning at all. waste of money. I had such high hopes for this item because I live in an efficiency and don't have time for the laundromat. Don't spend your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for what it’s eorth
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable quality for what it is worth. I’m very happy, it works it’s like having a full size dryer. I sure What is surprise, exceeded my expectations. Perfect for a little apartments,ect...
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Dry Clothes
customer_reviews.text: The dryer does not work. My clothes have been in the machine for an hour, and they're not dry. Also, just to clarify to buyers, this dryer is not ventless, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work Good, Have had it for about a month.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Its me and my son. And doing laundry every day or every other day works. The only thing that sucked was i had to open up the back, when i got it, to put the belt on. Its easy. Theres special tool you need to open the one screw but i made the one screwdriver i was using work, carefully so i didnt strip the screw. Trying to find the right utensil to clean the vent still i currently use a lint roller for the soft part.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.H

customer_reviews.title: Stinks and ruins clothes
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to get this dryer. It was my second one the first one was wonderful. I had it in my hone for over a year with no problem. I sold it to the new owners then I regretted it and bought another. The new one smells so bad you would think I was sprayed by a skunk. My clothes smell like a skunk. I have not been able to get the smell out of the clothes or house. Tried calling the company but they just left me on hold.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Lescarbeau

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely impressed by this product. I live in a small apartment so I was antsy and nervous about buying a drying of some sort that I had confidence in, but WOW. Such a great product. Dries items well, even has cold, warm and hot settings. Dries about half a normal load of laundry. Depending on the item sizes washed, obviously. I would definitely recommend for others to buy this for their apartment or dorm. May seem pricey at first, but it's such a well made product and does such a great job that the dryer will definitely pay for itself eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight, quiet and fits on standard size utility shelves
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this little dryer. I mostly hang/air dry clothing such as pants & shirts. This is great for drying small loads of light & medium weight clothing which will dry in the warm air setting between 40 and 60 minutes depending on fabric weights and size of load. Very convenient to have for rainy days and for drying any immediately needed items like sheets. Also, its nice to have soft washcloths/towels, tee-shirts and sox! Super light weight, quiet and fits on standard size utility shelves (24"wide shelf x 13" deep) 1.5 cu ft Dryer is 23" high
customer_reviews.author: MA Resident

customer_reviews.title: Remember to get the vent piping!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely piece of equipment that arrived 4 days early and that took all of 5 minutes to set up - once I got through the packaging! I forgot the vent piping, fortunately, I have extra from my portable air conditioner - so I made do. I started it up and was amazed at how quiet it is. I did have to put it up on a table because it is very low to the floor and I am not as flexible as I used to be. I will add to this as I use it.....So, for first off - looking good!
customer_reviews.author: Moira A. Erin

customer_reviews.title: Air drying is faster than this machine
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this machine for a over a year. The filter falls out regularly, which is annoying, and it takes hours to dry a full load of clothes because there is an automatic shut off function when the machine gets too warm, and it generally shuts off within 30-45 minutes. I live in a hot climate, and air drying my clothes is faster. I just don’t have the space to air dry everything. I now use this machine basically to fluff up my clothes that have air dried, and have to wash my clothes in shifts as a result. It is better than nothing, but I am looking for a new machine.
customer_reviews.author: Homestead maker

customer_reviews.title: worked just fine and was fast drying my undies and bed sheets
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this dryer and used it twice for about 30 minutes, worked just fine and was fast drying my undies and bed sheets....but, stopped working, just like that :S so disappointed since I have a Magic Chef washer and dishwasher and both are great ;( terrible hassle, I dont even know what Im going to do since I don't have the box anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the size fool you. I got this yesterday and by the way the shpping was super fast. It's brand new with no dents or scratches. I placed 2 regular size towels in this mini dryer and I was amazed at how well they dried. I'll be honest to say that I was first very hesitant to buy it, but it's the best I've purchased for my RV.
customer_reviews.author: Betty R.

customer_reviews.title: Issue out of box, easily resolved.
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit. Does take a bit of time to dry - 1.2hrs generally per load. Initially had an issue with it making an _extremely_ loud clunking noise out of the box. Found the bracket for the drum was not tightened down entirely. A phillips screwdriver in hand and we were in business. Now it is even quieter than my Magic Chef portable washer.
customer_reviews.author: i spend too much money here

customer_reviews.title: That the customer service do care🤗🥰
customer_reviews.text: I love it.. it came on time 🥰🤗 It was in good condition and it does do its job.. Im a Satisfied customer 👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Monnie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dryer.
customer_reviews.text: The econo sensor doesn't seem to work at all. Other than that, this dryer is perfect. Use a vacuum cleaner to clean the filters. EDIT 10 months later, I'm still satisfied overall. The lint collector has broken; there's a very tiny piece of poor design that snapped off at some point. The collector can still be used, but once in a while it comes out and I have to replace it. No big deal, but given how it's designed, I can't figure out how to fix it. Still, it's a minor inconvenience. I'm very happy with this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how nice the dryer looks and the quality in the making, grant it takes longer to dry but the clothes are not smoked by high gas heat or the force of a 220 volt heating element. This dryer can easily fit a standard bushel of laundry and not bad timing on WARM setting yet! If you would never buy this than consider a dryer blowing out on you like mine did after 12 years of dependable service. L B
customer_reviews.author: Leisha B.

customer_reviews.title: exactly like i wanted
customer_reviews.text: small and compact, exactly like i wanted... however it also dries a little slow, be prepared to atleast run 4 hours per load, maybe more for heavy items that hold more moisture in the fabric
customer_reviews.author: Mercy Knight

customer_reviews.title: Beats going to the laundry room and spending $3 a load to dry my clothes!
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up and use ... even towels and blankets dry nicely in this little machine as long as it isn't overloaded. The best part is saving $3 per load drying my clothes in my apartment rather than the nasty laundry facility in my building. I was concerned about my electric bill but it hasn't gone up anywhere near the amount i was spending in the laundry room. This machine will have paid for itself in about 4 months thanks to that savings!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: My dryer keeps stopping then restarts after awhile. It takes over 3 hours to dry 4 average size towels. All lint is cleaned after every load. Not happy. Thinking I waisted my money for nothing. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The low heat is for knitters!
customer_reviews.text: The dryer is smaller by far than the other two sizes of the Magic Chef brands but this little sweetheart would surprise you. In my adventures with this dryer I had the joy of seeing for myself how the low heat button would do on synthetics...of all thing hand knit sweaters! The yarn was in no way melted leaving the garment wilted and overworn. If there could be any reason to own this it would be on those fragil synthetic yarns that cannot take even the LOW HEAT of standard dryers. This dryer is a knitters dream. L B
customer_reviews.author: Leisha B.

customer_reviews.title: Little dryer big results
customer_reviews.text: This dryer really packs a a punch for its size. I thought due to its size that it might take longer than normal sized dryers. I'm very impressed so far. There is not major ventilation needed, so you can put it almost anywhere. It is ready to use out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Charles Winters

customer_reviews.title: Makes clothes stink, died after three months.
customer_reviews.text: Dryer makes clothes smell like bong water. I'm venting it to the outside, so it shouldn't make my clothes stink. So I have had it three months, only using it occasionally when I'm really low on quarters and have no choice but to smell like a giant joint. After three months of very occasional use, it just quit heating. It's useless now. Biggest waste of 200 bucks ever. Pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Did not last a month before it started making this bad scraping noise like something is running the drum. It arrived with the side dented in badly so that's probably the issue. Couldn't send something so big and heavy back plus I was in desperate need of a dryer due to a bed bug issue in our old building. So I kept it and now it is so loud you can't talk over it. My husband needs to take it apart to see what's going on. Other than this issue it dries the clothes very well. I don't like that it only has high heat or air fluff but I manage. Can't say I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Maynard III

customer_reviews.title: Turn knob goes out..
customer_reviews.text: Dryer has worked perfect for me! Was a wonderful little thing, I use it about 2 times a week, and when it's being used it's used all day... Sadly the rotate switch has been confused, I'll turn the dryer on and when i come back the dryer is off... Apaprently it's going back clockwise towards the air dry, which isnt what I put it on... so I suppose after a year the switch will try to go out on you causing an extreme annoyance... given I walk away, come back and clothes are still wet.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: No more laundromats for me!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it, and so far so good! The dryer looks great, and it runs very quiet. My entire house is only 500 square feet, so I converted my utility closet into a laundry room. My washer is the Best Choice Products mini washing machine ( I put a 5 gallon bucket in there as a frame of reference for size. I hope to never see a laundromat again!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Brosnan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, simple installation
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this dryer! We hooked it up to an indoor dryer vent and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Arastrix

customer_reviews.title: This cute baby dryer works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so fun to have this hardworking cutie in my studio apartment. Looks like a toy. But gets the job done. Be sure to turn the dial around to the heat mark. The first third of the dial only pushes cool air for your delicates. I dryed a heavy robe. That took an hour. But I’ll take long drying times over trekking to the laundromat anyway!
customer_reviews.author: ANJANI W.

customer_reviews.title: Edit...
customer_reviews.text: This compact dryer is great. I have it vented out a window when in use and not when not in use. Don't overload it, and it should work great for you. Decided to edit this. This dryer is used minimally. Still, there are times when it will be running for a while and is like it is just on "fluff"; just air, no heat. Don't really like leaving this running & using electricity when it isn't reliably heating/drying. Should not have to be checking it to see if it is heating or not.
customer_reviews.author: Customer1

customer_reviews.title: Fair price, low quality.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this machine 3 times. They were all damaged. One didn’t spin, one made a scratching sound when it spun, and one had all broken melted plastic on the spinner.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great little dryer when you have limited space and no dryer outlet.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this 1.5 cubic foot MagicChef dryer for three days now and it is great. A very good purchase. I do find that using my Panda spinner helps with towels, but that is not necessary, and is definitely not needed for my clothes, including jeans. Follow the directions for high or low heat and it works great. I just check part way through the cycle and change to cool if my clothes seem dry. Then I take them out. I can do several "jeans like" pants and several tee shirts together with no problem. This was a great purchase for my limited laundry space and is a good companion to my Giantex washer.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: small size! and light, useful.
customer_reviews.text: It's very convenient! I can wash very small amount of my cloth without going out! Size is pretty ok for a small room, I put it in Kitchen! build quality is good, I try it 3 weeks, do not need a pipe for air ventilation, for 2 or 4 clothes' water is less than a humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what you need it for
customer_reviews.text: I like it for what I have it for. You have to limit the loads obviously as it isn’t very spacious. But that’s something you should already know anyway I’m just being captain obvious. I might try drying a load in the morning and one when I get home from work or something. I’m getting the washer dryer laundry tower to make this setup better. I also ordered the indoor vent they suggest. It seems to be working. It’ll do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Fantasy Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love it! No more trips to the laundry room.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! At first, I didn’t know how to best set the temperature. So it stopped working after the second use. I realized that the auto-stop was turned on. It detects dry clothes. I absolutely love this dryer. It dries more slowly than the standard dryers, but it’s not too slow. Because it dries more slowly the clothes come out softer than the standard size dryers. I got an indoor vent, but it turns out I don’t need it because the filter in the dryer is pretty good and catches all the lint. No more trips to the laundry room!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: other
customer_reviews.text: My package was delivered as expected and delivery instructions followed which i very much appreciated. However, I began using the machine the next day and at first everything was fine, then i used it a 2nd time after that and all i can hear is a noise in the dryer. Can the seller contact me please? Please note though that i have already discarded the boxes the dryer came in.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: ... after buying a portable washing machine and omg I love it! This is perfect for my small family ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after buying a portable washing machine and omg I love it! This is perfect for my small family of 3. Being able to finally do laundry at home without having to haul everything across the parking lot to the laundry room and then pay to wash and dry or to haul everything to my parents house is amazing! I would and do recommend this and a portable washer to anyone who doesn’t have a washer/dryer in their home and can’t like me.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy612

customer_reviews.title: Dries SMALL loads well / not appropriate for placing on the floor
customer_reviews.text: The drum is small, so this is inappropriate for a normal-sized washer. In fact, it is not appropriate for the small Magic Chef washer if you wash a full load. The dial is on the bottom, so you will probably be frustrated if you place this dryer on the floor. I can only assume that it is designed to placed upon something (apparently not the top-load Magic Chef washer).
customer_reviews.author: Titan Quest Addict

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good for the Size
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a 110v dryer. The dryer doesn’t get very hot but it does dry your clothes if you spin dry them well and leave them in long enough. A load for this dryer is 1 hooded sweatshirt, 3 t-shirts and a few pairs of socks. Overall, it does pretty well for its size and for what I wanted it for (RVing when camped at the same place for a long time) and to keep me from going to laundry mat.
customer_reviews.author: jlynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy,Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this dryer, it drys everything nicely, its quiet. It has a nice size barrel.I can fit a nice bit of clothes in it. It does leak at times but not something that you should worry about. I ventilate right through my window. It came nicely packaged. Super effective if you looking for something small for indoors. Awesome buy. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: precious

customer_reviews.title: Dry away
customer_reviews.text: We love our little dryer,m. We can’t put too many clothes in or it will not dry all the way and it will take twice as long to dry. After about 2 months of using it stopped working, since we were still under guarantee we called the company and they send the parts first and then they send a personal to come and fix the issue which was the start button. After that, we have not come across any other issues. Make sure to always clean out the filter. It does not bring extension tube to let out the fumes, that’s something your need to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Dries clothes quickly and still running like a dream after 8 months. Didn't raise our electric bill more than a couple dollars. Highly recommend if you have a small apartment!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Super light duty
customer_reviews.text: This works well enough for someone like me who seldom needs a dryer. I mostly dry my things on an old-fashioned wooden rack in the sun (inside my home) and toss them in the dryer to soften and/or remove wrinkles. This dryer is a bit counterintuitive as far as operation and inconsistent in temperature control. Also, the lint filter is highly inferior. I have to take it apart and use a damp sponge to sponge off the sticky lint. Most strange. Hopefully it will continue to function for the minimal usage I give it. Disappointing ultimately.
customer_reviews.author: N. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Magical Magic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Magic Chef to compliment my all in one LG washer dryer that takes 2.5 hours to complete the full w/d cycle. Installed this small wonder inside a kitchen cabinet and have it vented outside. Dryer is hidden from sight when cabinet doors are closed. Have had this magical unit since October 2017 and use it 2-3 times weekly. Dries fast and yes it does sound like a dryer, but what dryer does not? I’ve not used the dry feature on my LG since I plugged in this Magic Chef. This precious baby has saved me from the communal condo laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Sushimonster

customer_reviews.title: it works like a charm at first then stop and I keep testing it to see if my luck change
customer_reviews.text: it took me over 8 hours to dry 4 pairs of undercwear t-shirts socks then I called and spoke to a Amazon rep who attempted to get in touch with the manufacturer but wasn’t able to and said she would have them call me but no one did. I spoke to a Amazon rep 3 times after that and still no one contacted me about repairing the unit because the time passed for me to return it or get a refund so I’m stuck with a over size over weight paper weight
customer_reviews.author: patrick downer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect machine used with a Haier HLP21N Pulsator 1-Cubic-Foot Portable Washer. At first I looked at the all in one washer/dryers combos hearing the good and the bad. This combo is so much better and more cost efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Werden

customer_reviews.title: Love my dryer for my studio apartment I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love my dryer for my studio apartment I bought it with the matching washer. Bought the avanti mounting bracket and it did not look stable. After 8 hours my son and I finally put it together. My uncle had to disassemble and put it together correctly and mounting it to the wall stopped the shaking. He mounted the ventless duct on the side of the mounting tower. The filter is in the back on the inside of dryer. It snaps off and you rinse and snap back in. It's quiet and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Devonne McClure

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dryer
customer_reviews.text: This machine really dries clothes well and pretty quickly I put one load in after another keeping it going and it typically only takes about 40 mins to dry clothes completely I do use the heat cycle though my electric bill is already extremely high but running this machine all day, everyday for a week, has not raised my bill I turn off the heat in the house to run the dryer and the dryer heats the house well enough to wear a sweat shirt and not be cold I use an indoor drying vent but will have to change that in the summer to an outdoor vent or drying can become unbearable
customer_reviews.author: S Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really nice small dryer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent small dryer, with good features and performance. 120v unit but really performs...early on I dried 3 large bath towels to really see what it could do. Also handles my shirts, jeans, khakis very well...even a queen cotton blanket! Also it comes with a wall mount option, although in my case put it on a small shelf due to the closet layout...l had no problems lifting and placing it in my installation. I have the matching washer...Magic Chef MCSTCW16W3 1.6 cu. ft. Topload Compact Washer which is exceptional good unit as well.
customer_reviews.author: dgltrader

customer_reviews.title: Never go to the laundry mat again!
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is awesome! We have this in our small apartment and it does the trick. It fits a decent amount of clothes and dries quick. The best part is that you don’t have to vent it. It just plugs into the wall like any other regular 3 prong appliance. We use this with a small portable washing machine that attaches to our sink. Highly recommend this dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with a small washer for our appartment because we were not supposed to have any. And we lived on the second floor, a family of 4, and I hate laundry mats. This thing works great! Gets hot, and in the winter I dry clothes in it at night in my room, because I stay cold and it helps to keep my room hotter than the rest of the house lol.
customer_reviews.author: 4th flamingo

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely great dryer. Throw a dry towel in... and it drys in half the time. I appreciate its ability to heat a decent size load. Even a blanket. Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Yo

customer_reviews.title: Compact and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a travel trailer. My grandmother works all over the states. It's difficult to pull in and find a laundry station. she loves it! Compact, and still does full loads. Can take a few extra minutes to dry. But is not a problem for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved from laundrymat Hell!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking about buying this dryer for your small apartment or dorm room or RV and you're aware that this is not a full size 220 volt machine...DON'T HESITATE!! This dryer dries 2 pairs of large men's jeans and 2 T-shirts in a little under an hour. It is QUIET, and simple to use. I have mine on my kitchen table vented out my window. I wouldn't run this unvented for the sake of efficiency and unnecessary heat and humidity pumped into your living space. The dryer will dry faster vented outside. Love this little gem and quick shipping from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down after 2 1/2 months of light use  *** Updated ***
customer_reviews.text: Had this dryer for 2 1/2 months and it breaks down. Was a nice dryer while it worked. Very disappointed with the quality of this product. *** Update *** Had to jump through a few hoops to register, and then request service with Magic Chef via their web site. But after that, they sent out a repairman who found a loose wire, fixed the problem no charge because it was still under warranty. So I am changing my rating from one star, to four stars, to reflect the warranty work done. I would have given it five stars, but the registration and getting through the manufacturers web site was not as easy as it should have been.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Will have to replace parts every few months
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved this dryer . However after only having it for 8 months it’s now turning itself off mid dry. After about 5 minutes it kicks back on. This cycle of on and off continues for hours. There are no clogs which leads me to believe it is a thermal fuse / switch. In addition to it shutting off it now has a horrible loud squeal that I’m assuming is the belt going orbthe drum. It leaves the clothing smelling like burnt hair. Definitely not worth buying if you have to replace parts every few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Quiet, efficient. Came packed well and was easy to install. I'm happy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cpageless

customer_reviews.title: This Dryer is the coolest.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a life saver, it has prevented me from lugging my laundry to a laundromat and fits conveniently into any space. I have used it for a couple of weeks and it works just as well as a full sized dryer. Read the Instruction Manual and you will be fine. The negative comments for this product are likely caused by human error/damage during shipment. Clean the Lint Filter after every usage, and vent out of a window and you won’t have any smell issues. I can even fit my queen bed comforter in here so I have no reason to go to a sketchy laundromat anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Rust

customer_reviews.title: Magic Chef dryer
customer_reviews.text: This dryer works great bought it last year and it is still going. Great investment if you live in a place that has no dryer hookups. Live in my 5th wheel full time and I am so glad we bought this dryer. Worth the money and I don't have to go to the laundry mat. Except for washing and drying big blankets have to go to the laundromat for those.
customer_reviews.author: Karebear

customer_reviews.title: so much better this way
customer_reviews.text: Just the ticket for my laundry..... got so tired of cleaning out everyone else's lint from their laundry in the buildings shared laundry facilities.....so much better this way....GREAT DRYER !!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth B.

customer_reviews.title: So far  --  very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: After using this dryer a few times, I have to say I really like it. Mostly I Iine dry -- but for my blouses I want all the wrinkles out. The last time I used it, I dried five blouses in less than 20 minutes. I think the instructions are overly complicated. After reading a lot of reviews, I decided to do as many did -- just turn the dryer to the "hot" position and let the clothes dry. I set my timer so that clothes don't overly dry.
customer_reviews.author: Outbacker

customer_reviews.title: Our rental doesn't have washer drye rhookups and this is a great way to bed able to do laundry at home ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm really liking this drye! Our rental doesn't have washer drye rhookups and this is a great way to bed able to do laundry at home without much Ado. It doesn't get super hot but it dries stuff pretty quickly. A load for me takes about 30 minutes at the most. No more laundromat for me!
customer_reviews.author: Steven D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Lovely little dryer. Works beautifully and is a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is great for my tiny home. It does emit a skunk like smell but it is just the new chemicals. I am sure it will go away soon. It smells just like a new cutting mat that quilters use. Must be the same chemicals involved. I hung my clothes out on the clothesline and the smell dissipated quickly. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this little workhorse! I absolutely love it. I live in a very small home. I bought an all-in-one washer/dryer combo with a condensing dryer. (Big mistake) While I love the LG washer the dryer is horrible. I unpacked this machine and began using it immediately. How awesome to have a load of towels dry in 45 minutes. The small footprint is awesome. It will fit in the cabinet above my washer.
customer_reviews.author: Lloydene Weiks

customer_reviews.title: 110 dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing portable can take it any were even in my motor home. I can dry two pairs of pants in 20 minutes or a bunch of socks under garments like 10 pieces dry in 15 minutes. So nice to have its been 6 months 06 2017 works great. But if you need big loads dry then go buy one of those blood sucking power hungry 220 dryers ill pass on that LOL .
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Smells Like a Skunk & bad Dryer
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't dry good, but the main problem is the terrible smell. Smells like a skunk, and I had to re-wash the clothes again.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a month and it's amazing. It's so nice to dry at home. I regret not getting this earlier.
customer_reviews.author: COlive

customer_reviews.title: It feels that it takes forever to dry
customer_reviews.text: It dries very well, it just takes a lot of time. We first received a damaged one, it was bent in one corner and it was really loud when operating. We contacted amazon the same day we got it and they got us a replacement the next day. The replacement was damaged on the same spot but it was not loud so we decided to keep it. We got a drying hose(I don't know the name) and put it on the window so the air goes out, otherwise the room gets humid and a little hot.
customer_reviews.author: PereiraFamily

customer_reviews.title: Good portable dryer
customer_reviews.text: It isn't a full sized dryer so it takes longer...but I knew that would be the case. I am just careful to not overload it and often will do half a load at a time. Separating out jeans and towels so that faster drying clothes get done. Still beats sitting at a laundromat IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not for regular launders
customer_reviews.text: Received dryer, liked the size but only good for small loads. After drying one load, dryer stopped working. Checked power, breaker, door, etc. Had to make 3 calls to CS and always getting wrong department. After 90 minutes and a call back, CS suggested waiting for the dryer to cool down. For best results, wash small loads often and only use when you can wait and hour between drying. I'm single and only launder my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: It’s the cutest little thing ever. It’s great for your small stuff, drys well and perfect for a small apartment, now I can stop hanging clothes all over the house. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Ivette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Apartment living
customer_reviews.text: I got this dryer because I was tired of sharing the laundry units in my building with everyone else. It's just me and my son so we don't have a terrible amount of clothing. As long as I use the highest heat setting, it's dry by the time my next load is ready to go in.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Stephens

customer_reviews.title: It makes a pretty horrible noise every time you use it
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It does dry fairly well. Cons: It makes a pretty horrible noise every time you use it. I thought maybe we just got a defective one and ordered a replacement, but that one was even worse. Unless you plan on running this in a separate room where you can close the door and not hear it, the noise will drive you mad. It's a noise like metal scraping... not pleasant at all. I returned the second one too and got a panda. Much happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Matte Christison

product_meta.title: Magic Chef MCPMCSCDRY1S MCSDRY1S 2.6 cu. ft. Laundry Dryer, White
product_meta.description: Size:2.6 cu. ft1 year parts and labor.
feature_bullets: 2.6 Cubic foot capacity, stainless steel inner drum.
Adjustable Timer Control, PTC Heating Element
Wall Mountable (Kit Included), Swinging door with integrated viewing window
Note: Kindly Refer the user manual before usage of the product.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,223 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
